languages.text: {n}Болезненный взгляд несчастного снует по толпе, пока его колючие глаза не встречаются с вашими. Голова приговоренного дергается, лицо искажают чудовищные гримасы. {/n}"Молчи! Молчи, пока оно не проникло внутрь!"{n} — словно в горячечном бреду шепчет он.{/n} "Не дамся, не выдам! Не выдам!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Между тем болезненный взгляд Горгориуса снует по толпе, пока его колючие глаза не встречаются с вашими. Голова писаря дергается, его лицо искажают чудовищные гримасы — с каждой судорогой сменяя друг друга. {/n}"Молчи! Молчи, пока мы не подберемся поближе!"{n} — словно в горячечном бреду, шепчет он.{/n} "Не выдай, не выдай нас! Внутрь! Живо!"{n} — его же устами отвечает фальцет.{/n}
traits.speaker: FW_CulpritMad

languages.text: {n}The wretched man's gaze drifts over the crowd until his piercing eyes meet yours. His head twitches, his face contorting in a monstrous grimace.{/n} "Shut up! Shut up, before it gets in!" {n}he whispers in a sudden frenzy,{/n} "I won't give up! I won't give it up! I won't!"
languages.original_text: {n}Болезненный взгляд несчастного снует по толпе, пока его колючие глаза не встречаются с вашими. Голова приговоренного дергается, лицо искажают чудовищные гримасы. {/n}"Молчи! Молчи, пока оно не проникло внутрь!"{n} — словно в горячечном бреду шепчет он.{/n} "Не дамся, не выдам! Не выдам!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The wretched man's anguished gaze drifts through the crowd until his piercing eyes meet yours. The condemned freak's head twitches, his face contorting in a monstrous grimace. {/n}"Shut up! Shut up before it gets in!"{n} — he whispers as if grasped by fever,{/n} "I won't give up! I won't give you up! I won't!"

{n}The wretched man's anguished gaze drifts through the crowd until his piercing eyes meet yours. The condemned freak's head twitches, his face contorting in a monstrous grimace. {/n}"Shut up! Shut up before it gets in!"{n} — he whispers as if grasped by fever,{/n} "I won't give up! I won't give you up! I won't!"

Shut up, before it gets in!"{n} — he whispers as if grasped by fever,{/n} "I won't give up! I won't give you up! I won't!"

Shut up, before it gets in!"{n} — he whispers as if grasped by fever,{/n} "I won't give up! I won't give you up! I won't!"

{n}The wretched man's gaze drifts over the crowd until his piercing eyes meet yours. His head twitches, his face contorting in a monstrous grimace.{/n} "Shut up! Shut up, before it gets in!" {n}he whispers in a sudden frenzy,{/n} "I won't give up! I won't give it up! I won't!"

{n}The wretched man's gaze drifts over the crowd until his piercing eyes meet yours. His head twitches, his face contorting in a monstrous grimace.{/n} "Shut up! Shut up, before it gets in!" {n}he whispers in a sudden frenzy,{/n} "I won't give up! I won't give it up! I won't!"

languages.text: {n}那个变种人的目光掠过人群，随后锐利的目光直视着你的双眼。他的头抽搐着，整张脸都扭曲起来。{/n}“闭嘴！闭嘴，别让它进来！”{n}突然之间，他以狂热的声音低语起来。{/n}“我不会放弃！我不会放弃！我不会！”
languages.original_text: {n}The wretched man's gaze drifts over the crowd until his piercing eyes meet yours. His head twitches, his face contorting in a monstrous grimace.{/n} "Shut up! Shut up, before it gets in!" {n}he whispers in a sudden frenzy,{/n} "I won't give up! I won't give it up! I won't!"

traits.locale_text: {n}那个变种人的目光掠过人群，随后锐利的目光直视着你的双眼。他的头抽搐着，整张脸都扭曲起来。{/n}“闭嘴！闭嘴，别让它进来！”{n}突然之间，他以狂热的声音低语起来。{/n}“我不会放弃！我不会放弃！我不会！”

languages.text: {n}El pobre infeliz observa al gentío hasta que su penetrante mirada se cruza con la tuya. Sacude espasmódicamente la cabeza y su rostro se contrae en una monstruosa mueca.{/n} «¡Cállate! ¡Cállate o se te meterá dentro!», {n}susurra de improviso.{/n} «¡No me rendiré! ¡No me rendiré! ¡No!».
languages.original_text: {n}The wretched man's gaze drifts over the crowd until his piercing eyes meet yours. His head twitches, his face contorting in a monstrous grimace.{/n} "Shut up! Shut up, before it gets in!" {n}he whispers in a sudden frenzy,{/n} "I won't give up! I won't give it up! I won't!"

traits.locale_text: {n}El pobre infeliz observa al gentío hasta que su penetrante mirada se cruza con la tuya. Sacude espasmódicamente la cabeza y su rostro se contrae en una monstruosa mueca.{/n} «¡Cállate! ¡Cállate o se te meterá dentro!», {n}susurra de improviso.{/n} «¡No me rendiré! ¡No me rendiré! ¡No!».

languages.text: {n}Zavallı adamın bakışları, delici gözleri seninkilerle buluşana dek kalabalığın üzerinde geziniyor. Başı seğiriyor, yüzü canavarca bir sırıtışla kasılıyor.{/n} "Kapa çeneni! Şimdi içeri girecek!" {n}Ani bir çılgınlıkla fısıldamaya başlıyor.{/n} "Vazgeçmeyeceğim! Onu vermeyeceğim! Vermeyeceğim!"
languages.original_text: {n}The wretched man's gaze drifts over the crowd until his piercing eyes meet yours. His head twitches, his face contorting in a monstrous grimace.{/n} "Shut up! Shut up, before it gets in!" {n}he whispers in a sudden frenzy,{/n} "I won't give up! I won't give it up! I won't!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Zavallı adamın bakışları, delici gözleri seninkilerle buluşana dek kalabalığın üzerinde geziniyor. Başı seğiriyor, yüzü canavarca bir sırıtışla kasılıyor.{/n} "Kapa çeneni! Şimdi içeri girecek!" {n}Ani bir çılgınlıkla fısıldamaya başlıyor.{/n} "Vazgeçmeyeceğim! Onu vermeyeceğim! Vermeyeceğim!"

languages.text: {n}ねじれた男の視線は群衆の方をなんとなく見た後、刺すような視線があなたと合う。彼の頭はピクピクと動き、顔は非常に醜いしかめっ面に歪む。{/n}「黙れ！黙れ、判決が下される前だ！」{n}彼は突然狂ったように囁く。{/n}「諦めない！諦めないぞ！俺は諦めないぞ！」
languages.original_text: {n}The wretched man's gaze drifts over the crowd until his piercing eyes meet yours. His head twitches, his face contorting in a monstrous grimace.{/n} "Shut up! Shut up, before it gets in!" {n}he whispers in a sudden frenzy,{/n} "I won't give up! I won't give it up! I won't!"

traits.locale_text: {n}ねじれた男の視線は群衆の方をなんとなく見た後、刺すような視線があなたと合う。彼の頭はピクピクと動き、顔は非常に醜いしかめっ面に歪む。{/n}「黙れ！黙れ、判決が下される前だ！」{n}彼は突然狂ったように囁く。{/n}「諦めない！諦めないぞ！俺は諦めないぞ！」

languages.text: {n}Le pauvre homme balaie la foule du regard jusqu'à ce que ses yeux perçants viennent se planter dans les vôtres. Sa tête est agitée de tics involontaires, son visage se tord en une grimace monstrueuse et il se met subitement à murmurer frénétiquement.{/n} « Silence ! Taisez-vous avant qu'il soit trop tard ! Je ne renoncerai pas ! Je ne renoncerai jamais ! Jamais, vous m'entendez ? »
languages.original_text: {n}The wretched man's gaze drifts over the crowd until his piercing eyes meet yours. His head twitches, his face contorting in a monstrous grimace.{/n} "Shut up! Shut up, before it gets in!" {n}he whispers in a sudden frenzy,{/n} "I won't give up! I won't give it up! I won't!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le pauvre homme balaie la foule du regard jusqu'à ce que ses yeux perçants viennent se planter dans les vôtres. Sa tête est agitée de tics involontaires, son visage se tord en une grimace monstrueuse et il se met subitement à murmurer frénétiquement.{/n} « Silence ! Taisez-vous avant qu'il soit trop tard ! Je ne renoncerai pas ! Je ne renoncerai jamais ! Jamais, vous m'entendez ? »

languages.text: {n}Der Blick des Mannes schweift über die Menge, bis seine stechenden Augen die deinen treffen. Sein Kopf zuckt, sein Gesicht verzieht sich zu einer monströsen Maske.{/n} "Haltet den Mund! Haltet den Mund, bevor es hineinkommt!"{n}, flüstert er plötzlich ganz aufgeregt.{/n} "Ich gebe nicht auf! Ich gebe es nicht auf! Niemals!"
languages.original_text: {n}The wretched man's gaze drifts over the crowd until his piercing eyes meet yours. His head twitches, his face contorting in a monstrous grimace.{/n} "Shut up! Shut up, before it gets in!" {n}he whispers in a sudden frenzy,{/n} "I won't give up! I won't give it up! I won't!"
